name: akhilbhansali
description: Akhil Bhansali Consulting Pvt. Ltd website
license: Copyright (c) 2020 Akhil Bhansali Consulting Pvt. Ltd. All rights reserved
author: Siddharth Kumar Jain, Akhil Bhansali

scripts.deploy-app: gcloud config set project akhilbhansali && gcloud projects describe akhilbhansali && gcloud -q app deploy
scripts.deploy: gcloud config set project akhilbhansali && gcloud config set run/region us-central1 && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/akhilbhansali/akhilbhansali && gcloud run deploy --image gcr.io/akhilbhansali/akhilbhansali --platform managed
